headline: Savvy Teens Find Loophole in Vaping Ban and Dive Through for Flavors
abstract: The policy allows mint, dessert and fruit flavors to continue to be sold in disposable e-cigarettes, prompting many teens to switch from Juul to those devices.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration is banning most flavored e-cigarettes, but that isnâ€™t keeping banana ice, sour gummy or cool mint out of the hands of McCracken County High School students.
